1. North America’s Tintina Fault More Active Than Thought – And Could Be Brewing A Major Earthquake  IFLScience

  3. A Massive Fault Line Was Supposed to Be ‘Dead’. It Sure Seems Like It’s Stirring Again.  Popular Mechanics
  4. Scientists just found a massive earthquake threat hiding beneath Yukon  ScienceDaily
  5. Mega-earthquake threat off US and Canada coasts  RuNews24

item.title: "Superhard" Hexagonal Diamonds Found In Meteorites Produced In Bulk For The First Time - IFLScience
item.description:
1. "Superhard" Hexagonal Diamonds Found In Meteorites Produced In Bulk For The First Time  IFLScience

  3. Chinese Scientists Synthesize Rare Lonsdaleite Diamond in Lab Breakthrough  WebProNews
  4. Scientists Make 'Alien' Diamond On Earth, Harder Than Anything Found In Nature  NDTV
  5. "They've Created Diamonds That Could Cut Planets": China's Meteorite Discovery Sets off Alarming Global Race for Cosmic Supermaterials  Sustainability Times
